column1: The GenBank ( http: / / www. ncbi. nlm. nih. gov / Genbank / index. html) accession numbers discussed in this paper are for 4931427F14Rik ( AK016477), Agouti gene ( L06451), Alx3 ( U96109), Alx4 ( AF001465), En1 ( L12703), M6pr - ps ( X64069), Tbx14 ( AF013282), Tbx15 ( AF041822), Tbx18 ( AF306666), and Tbx22 ( NM _ 145224).

Sections were blocked with 5% normal serum for 2 h, washed in PBS and incubated with antibodies against Shh - N19 ( 1: 100), Patched ( 1: 100), Smo - N19 ( 1: 100), Gli1 ( 1: 100), Gli3 - N19 ( 1: 100), SP - C C19 ( 1: 200), caveolin 1 alpha - N20 ( 1: 200), aquaporin 5 ( AQP5, 1: 200), megalin ( 1: 200), PECAM - 1 ( 1: 200) ( Santa Cruz Biotechnology, Santa Cruz, CA) or T1 alpha ( mAB 8. 1. 1, 1: 1000 dilution, Developmental Studies Hybridoma Bank, Iowa City, IA) overnight at 4 degrees C in a humidified chamber.
